title: MVC
content: MVC allows developers to uphold the separation of concerns principle by separating their code into three sections: the Model layer for data, the View layer for display and the Controller layer for routing commands between the Model and View.

title: Authentication vs Authorisation
content: "Authentication" means confirming your own identity. On the other hand, "authorisation" means being allowed access to a system.

title: ORM
content: Object-relational mapping using Sequelize has transformed the way developers create SQL database queries.
